documentation.description: Retrieve the corresponding project information for a given project. Configure must be called before calling this template.

description.span: object representing the project referenced by the key.

documentation.sample: <call-template target="org.wso2.carbon.jira.configure"> <with-param name="jira.uri" value="http://myjira.com:8080/jira/"/> <with-param name="jira.username" value="admin"/> <with-param name="jira.password" value="admin"/> </call-template> <call-template target="org.wso2.carbon.jira.getProject"> <with-param name="jira.projectKey" value="TP"/> </call-template>

parameter.name: jira.projectKey
parameter.description: a String containing of the unique key for a project
